q_ch: 2024年5月1日后才开始的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that will start after May 1, 2024. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group Name | Order Product ID |
|---------|------------------|------------------|--------------------|------------------|
| 32      | June 1, 2024     | June 17, 2024    | Master Sewers      | 32               |
| 31      | May 10, 2024     | May 26, 2024     | Master Cutters     | 31               |
| 33      | June 25, 2024    | July 31, 2024    | Master Cutters     | 33               |
| 34      | June 30, 2024    | July 10, 2024    | Expert Cutters     | 34               |

These tasks are all set to kick off after May 1, 2024. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE ct.start_time > '2024-05-01';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks that have a start time after May 1, 2024

response:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that will start after May 1, 2024:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group Name |
|---------|------------------|------------------|--------------------|
| 32      | June 1, 2024     | June 17, 2024    | Master Sewers      |
| 31      | May 10, 2024     | May 26, 2024     | Master Cutters     |
| 33      | June 25, 2024    | July 17, 2024    | Master Cutters     |
| 34      | June 30, 2024    | July 10, 2024    | Expert Cutters     |

Looks like there are some exciting tasks lined up! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😊
